name: Robert WILLIAMS, Petitioner, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY
name_abbreviation: Williams v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority

parties: Robert WILLIAMS, Petitioner, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted. The Order of the Commonwealth Court is vacated and the case is remanded to that court for a consideration of the merits of petitioner’s appeal.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
547 A.2d 350
Robert WILLIAMS, Petitioner, v. SOUTHEASTERN PENNSYLVANIA TRANSPORTATION AUTHORITY.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 20, 1988.
